description: Formation of vehicle cross over to existing vehicle hard standing and modify existing vehicle hard standing by installing strip drainage to a soak away and return 30% of the front garden to planting.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The car parking accomodation shown on the approved plans shall be provided with a hard-bound, adequately-drained, permeable, dust-free surface prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates and shall be permanently retained and kept free from obstruction thereafter. It shall not be used for any purposes other than the parking of vehicles for the occupiers of and visitors to the development.Reason: To ensure the provision of adequate off-street parking in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policy T6 of the London Plan (2021) and policies CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy (2012).

The submitted proposed site layout plan is not in scale.Please provide a Proposed Block Plan drawn at an identified standard metric scale (such as 1:200 or 1:500) showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site. The Block Plan must show the direction of North and should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.
